page.title: 05Games Played In Illogan
page.content: To play skipping you need a rope and three people. Two people hold the rope one at each end,and they turn the rope.The third person has to skip.Here is a rhyme we say."{Blue,Bells Cockle {Shells Evee Ivy Over}". We play{Ker plunk.You}have a plastic tube with holes on a base with different sections.Before you play, put plastic sticks through one hole and out another.When they are in you put marbles in a hole in the top. You choose a number and pull a stick without dislodging the marbles.{Crazy {Cricket}a game invented by boys in Treloweth School,is played with two batsmen and fielders.The object is to be in bat as often as possible.If you are fielding you catch the ball to go in bat. We use a tennis ball for it is easy to catch.The batsmen have to hit the ball high or he is out.
